first_level.name: Bless
first_level.description: This spell blesses the recipient with a +1 bonus to attack dice, damage dice, and saving throws. The reverse, bane, gives a -1 penalty to the same.

first_level.name: Command
first_level.description: The spell forces one creature to obey a single-word command for 1 round. The command must be in a language the creature understands.

first_level.name: Create Water
first_level.description: This spell creates 2 cubic feet of pure water. The reverse, destroy water, eliminates 2 cubic feet of water.

first_level.name: Cure Light Wounds
first_level.description: This spell heals 1-8 points of damage to any living creature. The reverse, cause light wounds, inflicts 1-8 points of damage.

first_level.name: Detect Evil
first_level.description: This spell detects evil intentions or evil auras in creatures or objects.

first_level.name: Detect Magic
first_level.description: This spell detects magical auras in creatures or objects.

first_level.name: Detect Poison
first_level.description: This spell detects poison in a creature, object, or area.

first_level.name: Light
first_level.description: This spell creates a light source equivalent to a torch. The reverse, darkness, creates a 1" radius of darkness.

first_level.name: Protection from Evil
first_level.description: This spell creates a magical barrier around the recipient that gives +1 to saving throws and -1 to hit rolls from evil creatures.

first_level.name: Purify Food & Water
first_level.description: This spell makes spoiled or poisoned food and water pure and suitable for eating and drinking.

first_level.name: Remove Fear
first_level.description: This spell removes fear from one creature. The reverse, cause fear, causes one creature to flee in panic for 1 round.

first_level.name: Resist Cold
first_level.description: This spell gives the recipient +2 to saving throws against cold-based attacks and reduces cold damage by 1 point per die.

second_level.name: Aid
second_level.description: This spell gives the recipient +1 to attack rolls and +1 to saving throws, plus 1-8 temporary hit points.

second_level.name: Augury
second_level.description: This spell gives the caster a yes or no answer about the outcome of a specific action in the immediate future.

second_level.name: Chant
second_level.description: This spell gives +1 to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws to all allies within range, and -1 to the same for enemies.

second_level.name: Find Traps
second_level.description: This spell detects mechanical or magical traps in the area of effect.

second_level.name: Hold Person
second_level.description: This spell holds 1-4 humanoid creatures immobile for 7 rounds unless they save vs. spells.

second_level.name: Know Alignment
second_level.description: This spell reveals the alignment of one creature.

second_level.name: Resist Fire
second_level.description: This spell gives the recipient +2 to saving throws against fire-based attacks and reduces fire damage by 1 point per die.

second_level.name: Silence 15' Radius
second_level.description: This spell creates a zone of silence where no sound can be made or heard.

second_level.name: Snake Charm
second_level.description: This spell charms 1-6 snakes, making them friendly to the caster.

second_level.name: Speak with Animals
second_level.description: This spell allows the caster to communicate with animals.

third_level.name: Animate Dead
third_level.description: This spell animates 1-6 skeletons or zombies from dead bodies.

third_level.name: Continual Light
third_level.description: This spell creates a permanent light source equivalent to a torch. The reverse, continual darkness, creates a permanent 1" radius of darkness.

third_level.name: Create Food & Water
third_level.description: This spell creates enough food and water to feed 3-18 humans for one day.

third_level.name: Cure Blindness
third_level.description: This spell cures blindness or deafness. The reverse, cause blindness, causes permanent blindness unless cured.

third_level.name: Cure Disease
third_level.description: This spell cures all diseases afflicting the recipient. The reverse, cause disease, causes a fatal disease.

third_level.name: Dispel Magic
third_level.description: This spell cancels magical spells and effects in the area of effect.

third_level.name: Feign Death
third_level.description: This spell makes the recipient appear dead to all senses.

third_level.name: Glyph of Warding
third_level.description: This spell creates a magical trap on an object that triggers when touched by an unauthorized creature.

third_level.name: Locate Object
third_level.description: This spell locates a specific object known to the caster.

third_level.name: Prayer
third_level.description: This spell gives +1 to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws to all allies within range, and -1 to the same for enemies.

third_level.name: Remove Curse
third_level.description: This spell removes curses from creatures or objects. The reverse, bestow curse, places a curse on a creature.

third_level.name: Speak with Dead
third_level.description: This spell allows the caster to ask questions of a dead creature and receive answers.

fourth_level.name: Abjure
fourth_level.description: This spell forces an extraplanar creature to return to its home plane.

fourth_level.name: Cure Serious Wounds
fourth_level.description: This spell heals 2-16 points of damage to any living creature. The reverse, cause serious wounds, inflicts 2-16 points of damage.

fourth_level.name: Divination
fourth_level.description: This spell gives the caster information about the immediate future.

fourth_level.name: Exorcise
fourth_level.description: This spell forces a possessing entity to leave its host.

fourth_level.name: Neutralize Poison
fourth_level.description: This spell neutralizes any poison in the recipient's system.

fourth_level.name: Protection from Evil 10' Radius
fourth_level.description: This spell creates a magical barrier around the recipient and all allies within 10' that gives +1 to saving throws and -1 to hit rolls from evil creatures.

fourth_level.name: Speak with Plants
fourth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to communicate with plants and animate them.

fourth_level.name: Sticks to Snakes
fourth_level.description: This spell transforms 2-8 sticks into snakes that obey the caster's commands.

fifth_level.name: Atonement
fifth_level.description: This spell restores a fallen cleric to their former status.

fifth_level.name: Commune
fifth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to ask questions of their deity and receive yes or no answers.

fifth_level.name: Commune with Nature
fifth_level.description: This spell gives the caster information about the surrounding area.

fifth_level.name: Create Food & Water
fifth_level.description: This spell creates enough food and water to feed 3-18 humans for one day.

fifth_level.name: Dispel Evil
fifth_level.description: This spell gives the recipient +2 to saving throws against evil creatures and -2 to hit rolls from evil creatures.

fifth_level.name: Flame Strike
fifth_level.description: This spell creates a column of divine fire that causes 8-48 points of damage to all creatures in the area.

fifth_level.name: Insect Plague
fifth_level.description: This spell creates a swarm of insects that causes 1-10 points of damage per round to all creatures in the area.

fifth_level.name: Quest
fifth_level.description: This spell forces a creature to perform a specific task or suffer penalties.

fifth_level.name: Raise Dead
fifth_level.description: This spell restores life to a dead creature. The reverse, slay living, causes instant death to a living creature.

fifth_level.name: True Seeing
fifth_level.description: This spell allows the recipient to see through illusions and invisibility.

sixth_level.name: Animate Objects
sixth_level.description: This spell animates 1-6 objects to fight for the caster.

sixth_level.name: Blade Barrier
sixth_level.description: This spell creates a wall of whirling blades that causes 8-48 points of damage to creatures passing through it.

sixth_level.name: Conjure Animals
sixth_level.description: This spell summons 1-8 animals to serve the caster.

sixth_level.name: Find the Path
sixth_level.description: This spell shows the caster the most direct path to a desired destination.

sixth_level.name: Heal
sixth_level.description: This spell heals all damage and removes all diseases and poisons from the recipient. The reverse, harm, causes 1-100 points of damage.

sixth_level.name: Heroes' Feast
sixth_level.description: This spell creates a feast that heals 1-8 points of damage and gives +1 to attack rolls and saving throws for 12 hours.

sixth_level.name: Part Water
sixth_level.description: This spell parts a body of water, creating a dry path through it.

sixth_level.name: Projected Image
sixth_level.description: This spell creates an illusionary image of the caster that can move and speak.

sixth_level.name: Speak with Monsters
sixth_level.description: This spell allows the caster to communicate with any monster.

sixth_level.name: Word of Recall
sixth_level.description: This spell teleports the caster and up to 6 others to a previously designated sanctuary.

seventh_level.name: Astral Spell
seventh_level.description: This spell allows the caster to project their astral form to the Astral Plane.

seventh_level.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
seventh_level.description: This spell summons an earth elemental to serve the caster.

seventh_level.name: Conjure Fire Elemental
seventh_level.description: This spell summons a fire elemental to serve the caster.

seventh_level.name: Conjure Water Elemental
seventh_level.description: This spell summons a water elemental to serve the caster.

seventh_level.name: Control Weather
seventh_level.description: This spell allows the caster to control the weather in the area of effect.

seventh_level.name: Earthquake
seventh_level.description: This spell creates an earthquake that causes damage to structures and creatures in the area.

seventh_level.name: Gate
seventh_level.description: This spell opens a gate to another plane and summons a creature from that plane.

seventh_level.name: Holy Word
seventh_level.description: This spell causes damage to evil creatures and may banish them to another plane. The reverse, unholy word, affects good creatures.

seventh_level.name: Regenerate
seventh_level.description: This spell regenerates lost limbs and organs of the recipient.

seventh_level.name: Restoration
seventh_level.description: This spell restores all ability score points lost to level drain or other effects.

seventh_level.name: Resurrection
seventh_level.description: This spell restores life to a dead creature, even if they have been dead for up to 10 years per level of the caster.

seventh_level.name: Symbol
seventh_level.description: This spell creates a magical symbol that triggers a specific effect when viewed.
